meanings.definition: A group of air cells in the skull located between the eyes and the brain.
meanings.sent1: The ethmoids help to lighten the skull and provide protection.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use imaging scans to examine the ethmoids for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: When the ethmoids get congested, it feels like having a stuffy head.
meanings.sent4: The ethmoids are like tiny air pockets keeping the skull balanced.
meanings.sent5: Injuries to the ethmoids can cause severe headaches and vision problems.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or relating to the ethmoid bone in the skull.
meanings.sent1: The ethmoids bone is crucial for the structure of the face.
meanings.sent2: Surgeons study the ethmoids bone to understand facial anatomy better.
meanings.sent3: Wearing a helmet can protect the ethmoids bone during sports.
meanings.sent4: The ethmoids bone acts as a foundation for the nasal cavity.
meanings.sent5: A healthy diet contributes to the strength of the ethmoids bone.
